rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with ample space for turning around and comfortable seating area.

Large, strategically placed windows on all sides to maximize natural ventilation and lighting.

rooms.description: 1BHK bedroom with a spacious balcony designed for natural light and air circulation; wheelchair accessible via an internal ramp.
